member.name: T:Rognir.NPCs.Rognir.RognirBoss
member.summary: Class Rognir is the base class of the Rognir boss. It defines the defaults and AI for the boss.

member.name: M:Rognir.NPCs.Rognir.RognirBoss.SetStaticDefaults
member.summary: Method SetStaticDefaults overrides the default SetStaticDefaults from the ModNPC class. The method sets the DisplayName to Rognir.

member.name: M:Rognir.NPCs.Rognir.RognirBoss.SetDefaults
member.summary: Method SetDefaults declares the default settings for the boss.

member.name: M:Rognir.NPCs.Rognir.RognirBoss.AI
member.summary: Method AI defines the AI for the boss.
